videos.title: 🧠 How Go Slices Change Memory on Append (Mind-blowing!)
videos.description:
Track Go slice memory addresses to reveal hidden behavior 🧬

💡 In this bite-sized demo:
- Understand Go slice internals 👨‍💻
- Learn when and why Go reallocates memory 📊
- Avoid hidden performance costs 🚨

👀 A must-watch for Go learners and performance tweakers!

#golang #memory #slicereallocation #gointerview #goperformance #shorts #programmingtips

videos.title: ❗ Go Slice Append Inside Functions — Gotcha You Must Know!
videos.description:
Appending to slices inside functions isn't as simple as it looks in Go ⚠️

📹 In this short:
- Learn why your slice doesn't change outside a function 🙅‍♂️
- Understand Go's pass-by-value behavior 🔄
- Fix subtle bugs in your code ✅

🎯 Essential for Go devs doing functional refactoring!

#golang #functions #slicebehavior #codinggotchas #gointerview #golangshorts #refactoring #backend
